src:
PSS Sleman Belum Bisa Turunkan Brian Ferreira
01 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman dipastikan belum bisa menurunkan gelandang asingnya, Brian Ferreira ketika menghadapi PSIS Semarang, Sabtu (02/11/2019) besok di Stadion Maguwoharjo. Pemain asal Argentina tersebut belum pulih dari cedera.
Bahkan, Brian Ferreira juga tak kunjung berlatih dengan tim. Karena berdasarkan rekomendasi tim medis, bekas pemain Johor Darul Ta'zim tersebut belum diperbolehkan mengikuti latihan.
"Memang dari medis, tidak merekomendasikan untuk berlatih karena waktu lawan Persija dia kesikut di daerah lambungnya," kata pelatih PSS, Seto Nurdiyantoro, Jumat (01/11/2019).
Laga melawan PSIS akan menjadi yang kedua kalinya Brian absen karena cederanya tersebut. Sebelumnya, dia juga menepi ketika PSS Sleman melawat ke markas Persebaya.
Brian Ferreira sendiri merupakan salah satu pemain yang cukup penting bagi PSS Sleman. Meski posisinya sebagai gelandang serang, dia sudah menyumbang 9 gol dari 19 kali penampilannya.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
PSS Sleman Cannot Lower Brian Ferreira
Nov 01 2019, 11:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman certainly can not lose its foreign midfielder, Brian Ferreira when facing PSIS Semarang, Saturday (02/11/2019) tomorrow at Maguwoharjo Stadium. The Argentine has not recovered from injuries.
In fact, Brian Ferreira also never trained with the team. Because based on the recommendation of the medical team, the former Johor Darul Ta'zim player was not yet allowed to take part in training.
"Indeed, from the medical, not recommend to practice because when the opponent Persija he elbowed in his stomach area," said PSS coach, Seto Nurdiyantoro, Friday (01/11/2019).
The match against PSIS will be the second time Brian is absent because of the injury. Previously, he also pulled over when the PSS Sleman visited the Persebaya headquarters.
Brian Ferreira himself is one of the players who is quite important for PSS Sleman. Despite his position as an attacking midfielder, he has contributed 9 goals in 19 appearances.
